text: (eyata ema dutayin ovunta) “obage mutun mittan kumak mata sitinu oba dutuvehuda, itat vada rju margaya ma oba veta genævit sitiyadida, (obage mutun mittanva oba anugamanaya karanne)?” yayi vimasuha. eyata ovun “(eseya! ovunvama api anugamanaya karana atara) oba gena a dæyada niyata vasayenma api pratiksepa karannemu” yayida pævasuha
